step1: Peel and chop fresh beetroot into small cubes
step2: Boil the beetroot pieces in water for 20-25 minutes until soft
step3: Strain the liquid and add a few drops of lemon juice to brighten the color

step1: Mix 2 tablespoons of turmeric powder with 1 cup of warm water
step2: Add a teaspoon of coconut oil to help the color bind better
step3: Stir well until the mixture is smooth and uniform

step1: Wash and blanch fresh spinach leaves in boiling water for 2 minutes
step2: Blend the blanched spinach with minimal water to create a paste
step3: Strain through a fine mesh to extract the vibrant green liquid

step1: Chop red cabbage and boil in water for 30 minutes
step2: Strain the purple liquid into a clean container
step3: Add a pinch of baking soda to turn the color from purple to blue

step1: Peel and grate fresh carrots then boil in water for 15 minutes
step2: Blend the softened carrots with cooking liquid until smooth
step3: Add a pinch of turmeric to enhance the orange hue

step1: Chop red cabbage finely and boil in water for 25 minutes
step2: Strain the liquid to get a deep purple base
step3: Add a few drops of vinegar to stabilize and intensify the purple color

step1: Mash fresh strawberries and simmer with water on low heat
step2: Strain the mixture to remove seeds and pulp
step3: Add lemon juice to preserve the bright pink color
